actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Ordered reported an original measure without recommendation.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Hatch. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 222.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, GAO, OMB.

official_title: An original bill to extend the President's Commission for the Study of Ethical Problems in Medicine and Biomedical and Behavioral Research until December 31, 1986.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to extend the President's Commission for the Study of Ethical Problems in Medicine and Biomedical and Behavioral Research until December 31, 1986.

titles.title: An original bill to extend the President's Commission for the Study of Ethical Problems in Medicine and Biomedical and Behavioral Research until December 31, 1986.
